info.name: CDS PH Triggers
info.description: Quick scripts to test the CDS Hooks for PH Triggers

exec: tests["reportable string"] = data.cards[0].summary.has("Match found in RCTC");
tests["codes present"] = data.cards[0].detail.has("This encounter event includes a code that matched a reportable condition trigger code")

item.name: Positive Matching Full Context with Patient

exec: tests["reportable string"] = data.cards[0].summary.has("Match found in RCTC");
tests["codes present"] = data.cards[0].detail.has("This encounter event includes a code that matched a reportable condition trigger code")
tests["error message"] = data.message === "Unable to process payload!"
